page.title: 06Recent Local Events
page.content: In the last few years there have been several{robberies,}especially near Waterfall Cottage, where purses, hand bags and other belongings have been stolen out of parked cars. The{Devonshire Arms}has been improved and extended. There is a new bar and lots of new bedrooms. The{Priory Church}has been restored. The{Cricket}ground used to be on the east side of the river but they moved it to the other side because there is more parking space. The{Village Hall}was built for pantomimes, plays, shows, and parties. A new{car park}has been opened in Bolton Abbey, and the car park at the Cavendish Pavilion extended.
